definition: need not/does not have to/not necessarily

sentences.english: The result is, that it is not necessary to use gibberlin acid.
sentences.chinese: 實驗結果是，種子不必經過酸處理也可以發芽。

sentences.english: Don't leave the engine to warm up in winter; you're burning petrol unnecessarily.
sentences.chinese: 冬天的時候，不要讓引擎空轉，這是在不必要地費油。

sentences.english: Your joke spared her needless embarrassment.
sentences.chinese: 你的笑話解除了她不必要的焦慮。

sentences.english: Theresult, he said, wouldbe unnecessary volatility.
sentences.chinese: 他說，這樣做會導致不必要的波動。

sentences.english: Within the informal work method of RUP, this is often unnecessary.
sentences.chinese: 在RUP方法的正式工作中，這常常是不必要的。

sentences.english: That way, they wouldn’t have to worry about encountering poachers and other dangerous humans.
sentences.chinese: 這樣就不必擔心他們遭遇偷獵者和其他危險分子了。

sentences.english: You don't need to start with Chapter 1 and read it cover to cover.
sentences.chinese: 您不必與第1章開始和讀取它從頭到尾。

sentences.english: Toby, to his credit, didn’t need to be told twice.
sentences.chinese: 託比這一點值得讚揚，他不必我說第二次。

sentences.english: Needless to say, since it's a sacred scripture, the meaning of it is important to you.
sentences.chinese: 更不必說，因爲是聖經，它的意義對你很重要。

sentences.english: The dampness is unpleasant , not to mention the cold .
sentences.chinese: 潮溼就令人不快，更不必說寒冷了。

sentences.english: You don't just have to sit in the stands and gape at the exploits of others.
sentences.chinese: 你大可不必坐在看臺上，目瞪口呆地盯着別人的戰績。

sentences.english: If you feel guilty about doing this, don’t be.
sentences.chinese: 如果你覺得這麼做你會有內疚感，那就大可不必。

sentences.english: Rather than dealing with your mail yourself, you can outsource the task.
sentences.chinese: 處理郵件的事你可以申請外援，不必親自勞神。

sentences.english: This, in turn, may cause more page breaks than are strictly necessary.
sentences.chinese: 這進而會導致一些嚴格說來不必要的換頁。

sentences.english: Doing so would help prevent the sample from becoming unnecessarily moist.
sentences.chinese: 這樣做會有助於阻止樣品不必要的受潮。

sentences.english: You need not have been here so early , the meeting being at 9o?clock.
sentences.chinese: 你不必那麼早，會議在9點鐘纔開始。

definition: to make sb change their ways, opinions etc
solely engrossed in one thing/just (one thing, no need to worry about the rest)/simply/by all means/please feel free/do not hesitate (to ask for sth)
to take a lot of trouble (over sb or sth)/may I trouble you (to do sth)
